name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

name: Charmander
description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Pikachu
description: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

name: Jigglypuff
description: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: Ekans
description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

name: Sandshrew
description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidoran♂
description: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

name: Vulpix
description: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

name: Zubat
description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: Lugia
description: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

name: Chikorita
description: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.

name: Cyndaquil
description: It is timid, and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

name: Totodile
description: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. Even its trainer must be careful.

name: Sentret
description: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.

name: Ledyba
description: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live LEDYBA in countless numbers.

name: Spinarak
description: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

name: Chinchou
description: LANTURN is known to emit light. If you peer down into the dark sea from a ship at night, you can sometimes see this POKéMON's light rising from the depths where it swims.

name: Pichu
description: When PICHU plays with others, it may short out electricity with another PICHU, creating a shower of sparks.

name: Mareep
description: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

name: Marill
description: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in water.

name: Hoppip
description: The leaves and small branches on its body are used to briskly climb trees. It shortens its sleep to perform its dance at night.

name: Celebi
description: This POKéMON came from the future by crossing over time. It is thought that so long as CELEBI appears, a bright and shining future awaits us.

name: Treecko
description: TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.

name: Torchic
description: TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER, following behind with unsteady steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees F, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.

name: Mudkip
description: MUDKIP uses the sensitive radar receptors on its headfin to determine what's going on around it. In a pinch, it can brandish enough power to crush rocks.

name: Kecleon
description: KECLEON is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception—this POKéMON can't change the zigzag pattern on its belly.

name: Absol
description: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.

name: Groudon
description: GROUDON has long been described in mythology as the POKéMON that raised lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.

name: Rayquaza
description: RAYQUAZA is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between KYOGRE and GROUDON.

name: Jirachi
description: A legend states that JIRACHI will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

name: Deoxys
description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON's chest appears to be its brain.

name: Turtwig
description: TURTWIG is a small, light green, quadruped Pokémon resembling a turtle or tortoise. Its eyes, feet, and lower jaw are yellow. Its body is covered by a brown shell that is composed of earth. The shell has a thick rim and a dark brown diamond pattern encircling it.

name: Chimchar
description: CHIMCHAR is a small, bipedal, primate-like Pokémon. It is primarily orange with a cream underside from the chest to the tip of its tail. It has a swirly crest of hair on its head.

name: Piplup
description: PIPLUP is a light-blue, penguin-like Pokémon, which is covered in thick down to insulate against the cold. It has a dark blue head with a primarily white face and a short, yellow beak. The dark blue feathers on its head extend down its back and around its neck, which causes it to appear as if it is wearing a cape.

name: Starly
description: STARLY has a body of somewhat spherical shape. When STARLY flaps its wings, it releases its internal energy as a powerful force, which can deflect attacks.

name: Bidoof
description: BIDOOFA is a short, brown, rodent-like Pokémon. It has a short, dark brown snout and a small, red nose. Its ears are large and covered in dark brown fur, and its eyes appear to be perpetually closed. BIDOOFA has a short, dark brown snout and a small, red nose.

name: Kricketot
description: KRICKETOT's legs are short, and its body is spherical. On its head is an orange, oval marking. It has floppy, oval-shaped eyes with downturned crinkled mouth. KRICKETOT's legs are short, and its body is spherical.

name: Shinx
description: SHINX is a quadrupedal, feline Pokémon resembling a lion cub or lynx kitten. Its front half is light blue, while its back half is black. It has a short, rounded muzzle with a small, black nose, bright blue eyes with yellow sclerae, and rounded ears. A shaggy ruff of fur forms around its neck. There is a yellow band shape on its nose, and a short, tufted extension on the tip of its tail.

name: Budew
description: BUDEW is a small, rose-like Pokémon with a round body and a green bud on top of its head. Its legs are stubby and its underside is blue. The bud on its head grows as it gains experience. BUDEW's bud will bloom when it is happy, and it will release a sweet scent.

name: Cranidos
description: CRANIDOS is a primarily blue dinosaurian Pokémon with two red spikes that protrude from its frill. It has a hooked beak, red irises, and a white bump on its forehead. Its blue skin is mostly smooth, with a scaly pattern on its legs, tail, and face.

name: Shieldon
description: SHIELDON is a gray, ceratopsian-like Pokémon. It has white toes and a white bump on its back. Its face is white with a black design that resembles a shield. Its lower jaw is yellow with two teeth sticking out. Its head is covered with a gray, helmet-like shell with a small, red gem on its back. Its face is white with a black design that resembles a shield.

name: Burmy
description: BURMY is a small, round Pokémon with a cloak of leaves, sand, or building insulation. The cloak is known to be made from materials in its environment. The cloak has a number of holes where its eyes and mouth can be seen, as well as a hole in the top where its head pokes out.

name: Combee
description: COMBEE is a small Pokémon resembling three black-and-yellow striped hexagons stacked vertically with a single, large eye on each face. It has two black, antennae-like stripes on its top and a black, conical extension on its underside. There is a ring of yellow around each of its round eyes.

name: Pachirisu
description: PACHIRISU is a small, white squirrel-like Pokémon with a faint blueish tint and a light blue stripe starting from its forehead and goes all the way down to the tip of the tail. There is a pattern of three yellow stripes down its back, and its belly and the undersides of its tail are cream-colored.

name: Manaphy
description: MANAPHY is a small, aquatic Pokémon with stubby feet. It has a blue, gelatinous body with a round head that comes to a point. It has a red gem on its chest, and there are two white dots of "collar" below its head. MANAPHY has a yellow, crescent-shaped fin on each side of its head and a large, club-like tail fin.
